UI_setting_chatEnable_tooltip: If toggled on, pressing a hotkey causes the mod to send a message in chat. Current message variants: When an ally tank is a target: %(ally)s When an enemy tank is a target: %(enemy)s When no tank is a target: %(default)s
UI_setting_event_tooltip:
This setting changes the number of horn sound event.

The playback button simulates the hotkey being pressed for 3 seconds.
UI_setting_hotkey_tooltip: Pressing this button in-battle plays a horn sound.
